meanings.definition: Join together (metal pieces) by heating the edges and pressing or hammering them together.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith welds the two iron bars to create a strong bond.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic welds the broken car frame back together.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to weld the metal pieces but ended up sticking them to its own arm!
meanings.sent4: Her determination welds her team together like a seamless bond.
meanings.sent5: The fiery heat welds the metal pieces into one solid unit.
